    Get plural form of a word

    get_plural.Rd

    Returns the plural form of a word

    Usage

    get_plural(word = character(), language = "en")

    Arguments

    word

    Original word, in its singular form (character)

    language

    language used for conversion (character)

    Examples

    get_plural(word = "study", language = "en")
#> Error in get_plural(word = "study", language = "en"): could not find function "get_plural"
